alert_bridge=Bridge Mode requires at least 2 network cards!
alert_mirrors_for_feedback=<span class="hot"> When binding multiple mirror ports, the default return port is at the mirror port. It is detected that you have bound the return port and it is recommended to delete it! </span> Confirm to delete?
alert_bind_mirrors=<span class="hot">In the multi-mirror collection environment, the separate hits must be forwarded by the switch. </span>Confirm to continue?
skip=ignore

desc_nicbind=1. WAN port: If you use a separate external line to access the Internet, you need to add a WAN port. <br> 2. LAN port: generally do not bind this port, in a multi-machine cluster, using the LAN port as a disk communication port.

get_gateway_mac=Get current gateway MAC
tip_vlanid=range 2~4095, used only when the switch disables VLAN 1. If 0 is disabled, double-layer QINQ VLAN is represented in x.y format.
tip2_vlanid=range 2~4095, only used when the switch disables VLAN 1. 0 means not enabled
show_pro_settings=Show advanced settings...
confirm_vlanid=<span class="hot">You set the VLAN ID to: <span class="color4">{0}</span>, which may prevent you from accessing Web Administration (you can enter console settings). If you do not know the operation, please do not arbitrarily modify it. <br>Confirm the modification of VLAN ID? </span>
warn_ip_range=<span class="hot">Warning: To prevent conflicts with the secondary route IP, it is recommended not to set the hit port to the 192.168.0.0/24 network segment. </span><br>I understand and need to set!
change_ip=Change IP

desc_network_mirror=1. Same route: The packet return data reaches the user directly through the switch (usually a Layer 2 environment). <br>2. Cross-route: Packet data is forwarded to the user through the gateway (usually a three-tier environment). Forwarding is determined by the static routing table. <br>3. Mirroring traffic replication: copy the mirrored traffic to a specified network card at the same time, and the received network card can be multiple. <a class="link need-reload" href="{0}">Click here to view Mirror traffic</a>.
td_net_topology_type=Network topology type:
td_net_option=Network Options:
td_mirror_copy=Mirroring traffic replication:
td_is_active=Activate:
desc_same_route=Same route<span class="mark">(user network and the same router as this machine)</span>
desc_cross_route=Cross route <span class="mark">(User network and local machine are not in the same routing area, independent BRAS system, and there is no NAT on BRAS)</span>
desc_has_pppoe=Whether to join the PPPoE layer <span class="mark">(Force the PPPoE data layer when back package)</span>
desc_has_vlan=Whether to join the VLAN layer <span class="mark">(Force the VLAN data layer when adding packets)</span>
nic_not_found=No network card available
actived=Activated
unactive=not activated
name=name
nic=NIC
topology_type=Topology Type
in_pppoe=Add to PPPoE layer
in_vlan=Add VLan layer
vlanid=VLAN ID
mirror_copy=mirror flow replication
is_active=Is active?
same_route=same route
cross_route=Cross Route

h3_pppoe_log=# dial log
desc_network_pppoe=Description: Allows the caching system to connect to the PPPoE server through dial-up networking. This applies only when the intranet is a pure PPPoE dial-up connection. In addition, you need to assign a fixed IP for cached dialing on the PPPoE server and set the preferred DNS assigned to the PPPoE client to this IP.

td_ppp_username=Dial User Name:
td_ppp_password=Dial Password:

ppp_option2=Automatically start dialing
ppp_option3=Enable debugging
ppp_option4=Specify the PPPoE service name

desc_wan_vlan_input=One configuration per line. Each configuration item is separated by a space. The format is as follows:

ppp_link_dev=PPP Name/Device
ip_mac=IP address/MAC
device=device
dns=DNS

td_downlimit=Maximum downlink bandwidth:

tip_uplimit=0 means unlimited
tip_downlimit=0 means unlimited

This system supports NAS network disks, and local disks are not required. <span class="hot"> After enabling or disabling the NAS network disk, please save and activate! </span>

mem_use=Memory usage

sys_avg_load_chart=System Average Load Graph
avg_load=Average load
desc_sys_avg_load=Average load is a comprehensive indicator of system pressure. Usually, a load greater than 5 indicates a high load, 1 to 5 medium, or less than 1 light, and an average load under normal conditions should be less than 2. <br> Disk IO is a part of the CPU load. If the long term is greater than 30%, it indicates that the system has abnormal read/write operations to the disk, or the disk itself has a problem.

You can use the cloud login-related technology to make other Internet users accessible to the Web. management. <br>2. Specify a unique identification name, can keep the login address fixed, starting with a letter, the following characters can be letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-), the length must not exceed 32 characters .

desc_live_source=1. This system supports HTTP, UDP, RTP, RTSP, RTMP format source, support unicast output or multicast output (non-shared source), support look back (non-rotation). <br>2. Review function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure storage disk</a></span> . The size of the occupied hard disk depends on the live source stream. Taking 8 Mbps as an example, each channel needs about 80 G per day. <br> 3. The intranet web player only supports H.264+AAC encoding source, it is recommended to use computer client or APP player.
td_enable_live_cache=Enable intelligent identification of channels and acceleration:
td_max_hls=Maximum activated live channel number:
tip_max_hls=(depending on memory size, approximately 100MB of memory per channel)

tip_live_preload=If enabled, the system will prepare data in advance, the channel will be open in seconds, but it will always occupy the external network bandwidth.

tip_live_port=range (8500-8999), cannot be duplicated with existing ones

tip_live_source_rate=0 means unlimited

desc_vod_settings=1. On-demand function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure storage disk</a></span>. The system simplifies operations by sharing the management of local video. <br><div class="pl15">Step 1: Enter <span class="hot">\\Local IP</span> (eg <span class="hot" in explorer or run >\\192.168.1.250</span>), confirm and enter your password, <a class="link" href="images/demo/open-share.png" target="_blank">click here to see an example</a> a>. <br>Step 2: After the video is transmitted to the server, click <span class="hot">Scan Video</span> to generate the on-demand and carousel data here. (The carousel data is recommended to be placed under the upload level 2 directory. , otherwise you need to manually fill in the path, such as: <span class="hot">upload\Movies\ChowStar movie</span>). </div>2. The intranet web player supports only H.264+AAC encoded mp4 files. The APP supports most common formats (depending on the hardware decoding capability), such as mp4, mkv, rmvb, avi, and so on.

desc_live_user=1. Please add user groups in the user group management and select the corresponding channel. The user group ID length is 5, such as <span class="green">10000</span>; the user ID length is 6, such as <span class="color4">100001</span>. <br>2. The user who uses the network set-top box to watch TV is called user group ID and user ID. For example: if the user group ID is <span class="green">10000</span> and the user ID is <span class="color4">100001</span>, the login user name is <span class="green"> 10000</span><span class="color4">100001</span><br>3. The default user account is (<span class="green">10000</span><span class="color4">100001 </span>) If the system detects that the default account does not exist, it will automatically create a default account. If you do not want to enable this account, you can disable it.

tip_notify_preview=Notification preview! The notification preview !
tip_scroll_notify_exptime=not to be less than 1 second, default 3600 seconds, effective when no deadline is specified
tip_notify_scroll_speed=Range: 1-9, the faster the value, the faster the scroll, the default is 2

tip_scroll_notify_show_interval=not less than 1 minute, default is 1

desc_app_upgrade_push1_for_itv=The APP name and the version number are separated by an underscore, such as the hotel APP_<span class="hot">24</span>.apk. At the time of uploading, the program can automatically obtain the version number of the named and named APP. <br>
desc_app_upgrade_push1_for_iptv=The APP name and version number are separated by an underscore, for example, the cell APP_<span class="hot">337</span>.apk. When uploading, the program can automatically obtain the version number of the specification and naming APP. <br>
desc_app_upgrade_push2=<span class="hot">APP supports online configuration</span>. After selecting push or configuration, it will automatically download the app from the official website and write it to the push data. <br>
desc_app_upgrade_push3_for_itv=APP支持播放启动视频，只需将要播放的视频传到共享根目录，并重命名为 <span class="hot">hotel_start.mp4</span> 即可（<span class="hot">不得超过300MB，否则无法播放</span>）。
desc_app_upgrade_push3_for_iptv=APP supports playing start video. Just transfer the video to be played to the shared root directory and rename it to <span class="hot">start.mp4</span> (<span class="hot"> More than 300MB, otherwise it will not play </span>).

desc_boot_video_settings=1. A video can be played when the APP starts up. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure the storage disk. a></span>. The format is mp4 and cannot exceed 300MB, otherwise it may not be able to play. <br> 2. After starting the video change or delete, it will take two restarts to take effect.
upload_boot_video=Upload start video
del_boot_video=Delete starting video
deleting_boot_video=Deleting startup video, please wait...
confirm_del_boot_video=Confirm delete start video? You need to restart APP 2 times to take effect after deleting.

failed_play_audio=The audio does not exist or your browser does not support playing the audio format.
failed_play_video=The video does not exist or your browser does not support playing the video format.

desc_boot_logo_settings=The LOGO image can be displayed when the device starts. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">, <a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure the storage disk</a> </span>. The format is a JPG image, valid only for the supported firmware (official set top box or TV).
upload_boot_logo=Upload LOGO
del_boot_logo=Delete boot LOGO
deleting_boot_logo=Deleting boot LOGO, please wait...
confirm_del_boot_logo=Confirm delete boot LOGO?
boot_logo_not_found=No image uploaded yet

desc_boot_animation_settings=An animation can be displayed when the device starts. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure the storage disk</a> </span>. Only works with supported firmware (official set-top boxes or TVs).
td_boot_animation_from=Select source:
td_boot_animation_width=Display width:
td_boot_animation_height=Show Height:
td_boot_animation_speed=Frame Rate:
td_boot_animation_time=Time:
tip_boot_animation_width=100-3840px
tip_boot_animation_height=100-2160px
tip_boot_animation_speed=1-30
tip_boot_animation_time=Video clipped, 1-10 seconds
td_boot_animation_mp4=One MP4 file (up to 50M)
td_boot_animation_gif=a GIF image (up to 10M)
td_boot_animation_jpg=Multiple JPG pictures (single picture does not exceed 1M)
td_boot_animation_png=Multiple PNG pictures (single picture does not exceed 1M)
build_boot_animation=Generate boot animation
building_boot_animation=Creating a boot animation, please wait...
builded_boot_animation=Boot animation generated
down_boot_animation=Download the boot animation file
please_add_boot_animation_file=Please add animation files first

desc_background_music_settings=1. The welcome page supports playing background music. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure the storage disk</a ></span>. The format is mp3 file. <br>2. After the background music is changed or deleted, the welcome page needs to be access for 2 times to take effect..
upload_background_music=Upload background music
del_background_music=Delete background music
deleting_background_music=Deleting background music, please wait...
confirm_del_background_music=Are you sure to delete background music?
